sentences.sContent: They're learning to swing dance in a class called whole body thinking.
sentences.sCn: 他们正在一节叫做“全身思考”的课堂中学习摇摆舞。

sentences.sContent: Rachel's dream has, for years now, been to be a professional swing dance instructor (specifically a Lindy Hop instructor).
sentences.sCn: 瑞秋很多年来都梦想去成为一名职业的摇摆舞教练，特别是林迪舞教练。
